definition: neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc

sentences.english: His collar badge designates his rank.
sentences.chinese: 他的領章表明他的級別。

sentences.english: The street light shone on the brass number on his collar.
sentences.chinese: 街燈照在他那領章的銅號碼上。

sentences.english: The street light shone on the met'snumarer on his collar.
sentences.chinese: 街燈照在他那領章的銅號碼上。

sentences.english: How did this young member of the family of Rotary get so many pins?
sentences.chinese: 扶輪家庭的這名年輕的成員怎樣得到那麼多領章？

sentences.english: I identify them by their red and white striped collar mark .
sentences.chinese: 這是我從他們領章上的紅白條紋看出來的。
